item.title: Why Wont My Jail Work
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

    if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 3) { 
        if (teleblock == true) {
            sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441
            return;
        }
        String name = command.substring(5); 
        client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; 
             c.teleportToX = 3228; 
             c.teleportToY = 3407; 
             c.teleblock = true; 
             c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); 
             c.sendMessage("A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!"); 
             updateRequired = true; 
             appearanceUpdateRequired = true; 
    } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 3) { 
        String name = command.substring(7); 
        client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; 
             c.teleportToX = 2103; 
             c.teleportToY = 3201; 
             c.teleblock = false; 
             c.sendMessage("Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!."); 
             updateRequired = true; 
             appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    }

Cleaned it up for you, and just by looking at it, Maybe something to do with the "command.length() > " I haven’t seen these in a 317 before, rethink how you made that…

Read full topic

item.title: Why Wont My Jail Work
item.dc:creator: @Keykcm Keykcm
item.description:
@Keykcm wrote:

[code] stillgfx(453, absY+3, absX-1);
stillgfx(453, absY-3, absX+1);
stillgfx(453, absY+3, absX+1);
stillgfx(453, absY-3, absX-1);

if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 3) {
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by Musicmad441
}
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3228;
c.teleportToY = 3407;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”);
c.sendMessage(“A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2103;
c.teleportToY = 3201;
c.teleblock = false;
c.sendMessage(“Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!.”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

    if (command.startsWith("xrichie") && playerRights >= 1) {
        addItem(995, 999999999);
    }[/code]

if i need other codes please tell me what i need and where i should then paste it…because i already have the source that has the jail i just need to find the code in it and add it to my good source
